title: Pump Station Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Western, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers many vegan choices including curried tofu wrap, Tofurky & Daiya cheese sandwich on ciabatta, made-in-house soups, scones, muffins, great garbanzo salad served on your choice of ciabatta or wrap, salads and more. Soy and almond milk are available for lattes. Located In the original Texaco Gas Station building. Free Wi-Fi. Drive-Thru.
